descriptionHtml:
Wild Peace Amulet 

This amulet is a sacred artifact of Kynareth, wild beasts
will be at peace with the wearer.

Same as the Voice of the Sky effect except its constant.
Found at the bandit camp site at the Riverwood/Helgen crossroads.

I happen to enjoy leisurely riding my horse from point A to B while
adventuring across Skyrim and nothing is more annoying than constantly
having wolves, skeevers, bears and sabercats attack me or my horsie, while
hacking wolves every 10 seconds is a great way to help level up it can be
a real pita later on, this mod solves the issue.

There are of course many other methods to achieve this, but this is mine.
Call it a cheat if you want, I call it peace.

Other than spiders this mod will keep the roads generally safe for horse travel, most monster spawns are away from the main roads so...have fun.

No requirements, made with latest patch 1.8
Install with NMM or manually.

(02/05/13)

Shad
